_description: Old Age — in long irregular stanzas of 78 short lines

BLHar913.First Lines:
Elde makiþ me geld and growen al graiwhen eld me wol feld
                    nykest þer no nai…
BLHar913.Last Lines:
…i mot be þat eld beþhe fint me vnder
                    fot
BLHar913.Note:
The item is split between two folios: f. 54v and f.
                    62.
BLHar913.Editions:
Wright,  Thomas,  and  James Orchard Halliwell-Phillipps, eds.  
             Reliquiae Antiquae.
         2 vols. London: Smith, 1845: 2.210-12.
Furnivall,  Frederick James. 
             Early English Poems and Lives of Saints.
Transactions of the London Philological Society
         1858; Pt. 2, Berlin, 1862: 148-50.
Heuser,  Wilhelm. 
             Die Kildare-Gedichte…
Bonner Beiträge zur Anglistik
         14. Bonn: P. Hanstein, 1904: 170-2.
